pack.name: AI Consortium Leaders
pack.tagline: The pharma leaders shaping AI standards â€” and buying AI tools
pack.description: Decision-makers at pharmas actively participating in OpenFold3/AISB, Pistoia Alliance Agentic AI, and other AI consortia. These leaders are shaping industry AI standards and have budget authority for AI tools.
pack.targetBuyer: AI/ML platform companies selling to pharma R&D
